when we share your information we may share your information with theater and event provider we may share information so that they may admit you or address customer service issue at the theater or venue or help process your ticketing or transaction or otherwise to fulfill the service

advertiser advertising network and other third party we may share information about how you use the service and interact with content or ad to better tailor service product marketing and advertising on the service and on third party platform

to enable these purpose we may share certain demographic information user generated content device information and identifier connection and usage data geolocation data public and commercial information and social medium information
these third party may use their own tracking technology to collect or request information about you please see our cooky notice
partner we may share your information with third party partner
for instance if you enter contest promotion or sweepstakes sponsored by third party we may share the information you provide for that entry with the sponsor

depending on the partnership we may share certain information including contact information at your direction identification and demographic information transactional information user generated content that you provide research and feedback device information and identifier connection and usage information public and commercial information and social medium information
we may also share your information with third party that provide video locker service if you purchase movie or other show to view at home
example of such third party would be movie anywhere

similarly we may share your information with the provider of loyalty program if you take an action in the service indicating that you would like to obtain benefit under such program through activity on the service
social network we may share your information with social medium platform for example if you click on facebook like button on the service the like may appear on your facebook account
to control this sharing of information please review and adjust your privacy setting for the relevant social network

depending on your privacy setting and action on such network we may share contact information identification and demographic information user generated content device information and identifier connection and usage data and social medium information

service provider we engage vendor to perform service for business purpose on our behalf and share information with them to enable them to provide u with such service including research and analytics hosting transaction and payment processing promotion administration fraud prevention identity management acquisition and other service

research and measurement company we may share information about content you view on the service with video measurement service such a nielsen tv rating a well a other analytics provider
see your right and your choice section for more information
search engine you may be able to engage with other member of the service or the public
this may make the name and photo associated with your profile and any comment or user generated content you provide visible to other member of the service or the general public
if the information is available to the general public it may also be searchable by search engine

law enforcement regulator anti fraud coalition and other group we share any of the category of information we collect a appropriate with these third party in order to protect and enforce the legal right privacy and safety of ourselves and our visitor
protect against possible fraud or other illegal activity
respond to request from government and other authority
and otherwise comply with legal process

other sharing we may share information about you often along with hashed or masked identifier with third party so they may better personalize your experience with them and the advertising and other offer they show or otherwise send you and to determine advertising effectiveness

with your appropriate consent when required and consistent with applicable law we may share your video viewing behavior with third party including service provider advertising company analytics partner and social medium site

california law broadly defines sale in way that may include allowing third party to receive certain information such a cooky ip address and or browsing behavior to add to profile about your device browser or you
this profile may enable delivery of interest based advertising on the service or other site

device information and identifier such a ip address and unique advertising identifier and cooky
connection and usage information such a browsing history or app usage
geolocation information such a city
and inference data

when this policy mention fandango we our or u it refers to the company or company responsible for your information under this privacy policy or data controller

the law of some jurisdiction such a the european union require company to tell you about the legal basis for using sharing or disclosing your information

to the extent those law apply we may rely on the following legal base performance of contract where use of your information is necessary to provide you with the service under contract for example the term of service
legitimate interest where use of your information is necessary for our or others legitimate interest and where the use is not outweighed by your right and interest

below are some example of such interest providing the service improving the service and developing new one recognizing and better understanding our user including across platform conducting security and fraud prevention activity marketing and promoting our content and service building and managing business relationship conducting compliance and risk management activity providing and managing access to our system legal obligation where use of your information is necessary to comply with law and regulation such a those relating to anti bribery and corruption and anti money laundering complying with request from government body or court or responding to litigation
with consent we may ask for your consent to process your information in certain way
where we rely on this basis you have the right to withdraw your consent at any time please see the your right and your choice section below to do this
how long we keep your information we will keep your information only for a long a it is necessary to fulfill the purpose described above unless longer retention is required or permitted by law
we may delete or de identify your information sooner if we receive verifiable deletion request subject to exemption under applicable law
the retention period that applies to your information may vary depending on the service you use and how you interact with them
child the service are not designed or intended for use by child under 13 and thus if you are under 13 we ask that you do not use the service or provide u with any information
if we discover that we have inadvertently gathered any such information then we will to the extent required by law delete such information from our record

there is one exception to this we may offer service that is directed to child under the age of 13 and if we do it will state that it collect information from child and it will also have separate privacy policy posted detailing the practice specific to that service
if parent or guardian becomes aware that his or her child under 13 ha provided u with information without his or her consent he or she should contact u at privacy fandango
your right depending on where you live you may have certain right with respect to your information

for example under local law you may be able to ask u to provide access to certain information we hold about you in some case in portable format if technically feasible update or correct your information delete certain information restrict the use of your information we will respond within the time period prescribed by applicable law
please note that many of the above right are subject to exception and limitation
you have the right not to be discriminated against a provided for in applicable law for exercising your right under some local law such a in california
some service can be provided only if we have your information therefore deletion of your information will result in termination of such service
we will take reasonable step to verify your identity including authenticating you through the email address we have on file
we may require further documentation such a password and user id before granting access to your information

how we protect your information we maintain organizational technical and physical safeguard to help protect the information we collect and use
these safeguard vary depending upon variety of factor including the sensitivity of the information we collect and use
despite all reasonable practice no security method is infallible

this is necessary to provide the service and for the purpose outlined in this privacy policy
data privacy law vary from country to country and they may not be equivalent to or a protective a the law in your home country
we take step to ensure that reasonable safeguard are in place with an aim to ensure an appropriate level of protection for your information in accordance with applicable law
by providing u with your information you acknowledge any such transfer storage or use
